benchmark_details.name: CERTAINLY UNCERTAIN
benchmark_details.overview: CERTAINLY UNCERTAIN is a dataset of approximately 178K visual question answering instances that encompasses diverse types of uncertainties, based on a novel taxonomy distinguishing between epistemic and aleatoric uncertainty in vision-language AI systems.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To improve AI systems' ability to express uncertainty in responses and acknowledge when they do not know the answer.

data.source: Automatically synthesized dataset based on fine-grained categories of uncertainty.
data.annotation: Automatically generated with prompts to large language models.

methods: Evaluation on standard metrics including accuracy and F1, plus a new confidence-weighted accuracy.
methodology.calculation: Confidence-weighted accuracy weights the accuracy by the probability of the model's prediction.
methodology.interpretation: Higher confidence-weighted accuracy indicates better model calibration and performance in uncertain scenarios.
methodology.validation: Dataset validation through quality checks to ensure valid question-answer pairs.
